description_txt: stated on August 3, 2015 in a video:

quote_txt: Says that Donald Trump "supported Charlie Crist."

description_txt: stated on July 9, 2015 in a press release:

description_txt: stated on August 6, 2015 in comments at a GOP debate in Cleveland:

description_txt: stated on August 4, 2015 in a segment on her MSNBC show:

quote_txt: Says Jeb Bush "significantly cut early voting prior to the 2008 presidential election."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2015 in a blog on his website:

description_txt: stated on July 28, 2015 in an interview with Mike Huckabee:

quote_txt: Caution: Kissing and cuddling chickens can be hazardous to your health.

description_txt: stated on July 31, 2015 in a speech in Miami:
quote_txt: On the Cuba embargo.

description_txt: stated on March 27, 2015 in comments on social media.:
quote_txt: Say President George W. Bush " ‘borrowed’ $1.37 trillion of Social Security surplus revenue to pay for his tax cuts for the rich and his war in Iraq and never paid it back."

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2015 in an ABC "This Week" interview:
quote_txt: "In 1947, when I was born, there were about 450,000 lions. In the mid-70s, when my kids were born, there were about 100,000. Today, there are less than 30,000."

description_txt: stated on July 21, 2015 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: Since parole abolition, Virginia's "crime rate has fallen to third lowest in the country, our recidivism rate is down 20 percent and that’s the second lowest in the country."

description_txt: stated on July 26, 2015 in a New Hampshire interview:
quote_txt: "97 percent of the work that Planned Parenthood does is about mammograms and preventative health."

description_txt: stated on July 9, 2015 in a written statement.:
quote_txt: "In 1960, we spent more than 3 percent of our GDP on infrastructure projects like the Interstate Highway. Today we spend less than 1 percent of our GDP on these vital investments."

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2015 in an interview on "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: Says Donald Trump is for a single-payer health care system.

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2015 in an interview on ABC "This Week":
quote_txt: Under President Barack Obama, income levels and unemployment numbers "are worse now than just about ever" for African-Americans.

description_txt: stated on July 20, 2015 in news release:
quote_txt: "Every year the First Coast Guard District saves 350 lives in the Northeast."

description_txt: stated on July 29, 2015 in a Senate floor speech:
quote_txt: Planned Parenthood is "the only health care that a significant number of women get. About 30 percent of women, that's their health care."

description_txt: stated on July 27, 2015 in a post on Instagram:
quote_txt: "We built a new prison every 10 days between 1990 and 2005 to keep up with our mass incarceration explosion of nonviolent offenders."

description_txt: stated on June 28, 2015 in an interview with NPR News:
quote_txt: Says states not directly involved in the gay marriage lawsuits that reached the Supreme Court "are not bound" by the court’s ruling.
